Remove all label attributes.

Source: R/funs.R
remove_label.Rd

Remove all label attributes.

remove_label(x)

Arguments

x

object to unlabel

See also

get_label, set_label, import_labels, expss::unlab

Examples

crosstable(remove_label(mtcars2))
#>           .id      label   variable
#> 1         mpg        mpg  Min / Max
#> 2         mpg        mpg  Med [IQR]
#> 3         mpg        mpg Mean (std)
#> 4         mpg        mpg     N (NA)
#> 5         cyl        cyl          4
#> 6         cyl        cyl          6
#> 7         cyl        cyl          8
#> 8        disp       disp  Min / Max
#> 9        disp       disp  Med [IQR]
#> 10       disp       disp Mean (std)
#> 11       disp       disp     N (NA)
#> 12         hp         hp  Min / Max
#> 13         hp         hp  Med [IQR]
#> 14         hp         hp Mean (std)
#> 15         hp         hp     N (NA)
#> 16       drat       drat  Min / Max
#> 17       drat       drat  Med [IQR]
#> 18       drat       drat Mean (std)

crosstable(mtcars2)
